head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LAFARGE, MARY LATHROP ALLEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LAFARGE, MARY LATHROP ALLEN

block.p: LaFARGE-Mary Lathrop Allen, 84, of New Canaan, CT and Lake Titus, Malone, NY on December 29, 2002. Loving wife of the late Henry Adams LaFarge. Graduated Nightingale-Bamford School 1936, Manhattanville College 1941. Tireless crusader for human rights, researcher and organizer of Catalogue Raisonne of artist John LaFarge. Mother of Beatrice, Bam and Catherine. Grandmother of Catherine S., Owen and Mimi. Donations to Catholic Relief Services, P.O. Box 17090, Baltimore, Maryland 21298, or the charity of one's choice. Requiescat in pace
